case.title: American male seeks Indian female for LTR - 37 (Brooklyn)
case.text: I am 37 y.o., Italian-American, good looking guy who seeks an indian female between 25- 45 y.o. in NYC for friendship and more. I am one of the most balanced people around Motivated and focused. I would describe myself as hard working, family oriented, fun, caring, friendly, romantic, open-minded, down-to-earth and easy going. feel free to reply with a photo if you are interested and ill return one as well. Thanks for taking the time and Good luck!.
